typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> source1
source1 lookup(ERROR_FUNCTION('') == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 join(ERROR_FUNCTION('') == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1
Join1 derive() ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 alterRow() ~> AlterRow1
